name: Creatures of Magalapgap #1 : Drigi_Drawgs
description:
Drigi_Drawgs had always loved magical Magalapgap with its fast, fantastic forest, field, but it was a place where he felt lonely. He was an intuitive, sympathetic companion with a green legs and pretty eyes. 
One day, Drigi walked over to the window and reflected on his green surroundings. Then he saw something in the distance, or rather someone. It was the figure of human. Drigi gulped, he was not prepared for human. As Drigi stepped outside and human came closer, he could see the bewildered glint in his eye. They looked at each other with happy feelings. human looked delighted, his emotions blushing like a real, round ruler. Then human came inside for a nice drink.
